translationtableentry.text: Lo scontro tra gli dei ha lasciato il segno nell'orografia di queste terre, generando un paesaggio di montagne strane e simboliche...
translationtableentry.result: The clash between the gods has left its mark on the orography of these lands, generating a landscape of strange and symbolic mountains...

translationtableentry.text: El enfrentamiento entre los dioses ha dejado su huella en la orografía de estas tierras, creando un paisaje de extrañas y simbólicas montañas...
translationtableentry.result: The clash between the gods has left its mark on the orography of these lands, generating a landscape of strange and symbolic mountains...
